title: iFFALCON 107.9 cm (43 inch) Ultra HD (4K) LED Smart Android TV with HandsFree Voice Search  (43K71)

product_specification.In The Box: 1N LED TV, 1N Stand, 1N Audio Cable, 1N User Manual, 1N Warranty Card , 1N - Remote, 2N - Batteries
product_specification.Sound Mode: Standard, Movie, Music, Voice, Game, Stadium, Personal
product_specification.Other Audio Features: Dolby Audio MS 12, Sound Modes, Equalizers - Dynamic/Standard/Movie/Music/Voice/Game/Stadium
product_specification.Supported App - Others: Eros Now, ZEE5, Voot, Jio Cinema, Hungama Play, ALTBalaji, YuppTV, T-Channel, Prime Video, Google Play Movies
product_specification.Other Remote Control Features: Voice Input, Netflix Hot Key on Remote, Google Assistant Hotkey on Remote
product_specification.Other Power Features: Instant Power ON, ECO Energy Efficiency
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: Warranty of the Product is Limited to Manufacturing Defects Only
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Warranty Does Not Cover Any External Accessories (Such as Battery, Cable, Carrying Bag), Damage Caused to the Product Due to Improper Installation by Customer, Normal Wear and Tear to Magnetic Heads, Audio, Video, Laser Pick-ups and TV Picture Tubes, Panel, Damages Caused to the Product by Accident, Lightening, Ingress of Water, Fire, Dropping or Excessive Shock, Any Damage Caused Due to Tampering of the Product by an Unauthorized Agent, Liability for Loss of Data, Recorded Images or Business Opportunity Loss.
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details: We'll facilitate the installation and demo through authorized service engineer at your convenience The installation will be done within 48 hours of delivery of the TV. The service engineer will install your new TV, either on wall mount or on table top. The wall mount is not included in the box and will be chargeable. The engineer will also help you understand your new TV's features. The process generally covers: Wall-mounted or table-top installation, as requested. Physical check of all ports, including power and USB ports. Accessories also checked. Demonstration of features and settings Quick run-through on how to operate the TV.

product_description.4K HDR: This TV from iFFalcon features a 4K display that is enhanced with HDR (High Dynamic Range) which is sure to take your TV viewing experience to the next level. The dynamic tone mapping helps boost the picture quality in every frame by intelligently enhancing the range of tones, contrast, and brightness.
product_description.Dynamic Color Enhancement: This iFFalcon 4K LED TV uses Dynamic Color Enhancement to enhance the color vibrancy so that you can enjoy a stunning viewing experience in your living room or bedroom. The use of a proprietary algorithm helps broaden the limitations of the traditional palette, making every scene appear more vibrant and rich.

review:
What an amazing tv it has everything the budget tv should have . First of all thanks to flipkart for very fast delivery and installation by jeeves.Coming to tv ifflacon (TCL) has done an awesome job.

Connectivity : 5/5

Its a value for money product for anyone who want a big tv with lg samsung sony level experience pls go for it u wont regret ✌✌.

Great product at the price.. Operating is simple remote is bluetooth connected ..( no IR Sensor)which I liked it very much Google assistant voice commands make it easy for operating.Bluetooth. earphones can be connected.inbuilt chrome cast&phone mirroring works like charm.picture quality is great.

The picture quality of the tv is good and the audio is also good .

There are small bezels in the sides that is ok.

the hands free audio system is not upto par but is okish

After using it for almost 2 weeks. below are the pros and cons.
Pros.
1)amazing picture quality.
2)upscaling to 4k is also fantastic.
3)tv unit looks beautiful.
4)almost bessel less display.
5)sound is really loud.

Cons
1)doesn't support 5g bandwidth.
2)Play Store doesn't have many options of good apps to be downloaded. (it's not like Google Play Store in our phones. There are very limited options for apps.)
3)TV runs a bit slow while switching between apps.
4)not sure if it has Dolby Atmos as didn't feel the surround sound.

After using for 2 months
The remote stopped working if the TV is on standby mode overnight. I have to switch off the main and switch it on again for it to work.

All the other apps stopped working showing no internet whereas Netflix works completely fine even then.
I have been using this Tv for about 2 days and the Tv is working perfectly, very good pictures quality screen and everything is good that i think it’s a very nice Tv the estimate 😍
Excellent purchase worth for every penny paid. Quality of the product is at par with Sony, Samsung and similar. Mesmerizing experience to watch 4K video's and Hd videos.l

I had been looking for a 4k 55 inch UHD for long time and after going around TV showrooms , following is what i observed.
1. If budget is not an issue go for OLED tv (LG) which give the best picture and 100% colour production .
2.QLED are as good as OLED but the viewing angles are very bad and the picture looses it true colour once we move to side.
3. Now coming back to IFFalcon 55 inch. I had a limited budget and wanted to invest the rest on good home theatre system.
Also OLED n QLED are the best and cannot be compared to the budget option 4k UHD tvs (TCL,VU,Hisense,Thompson etc).

IFFalcon TV pro's n cons :

1. Best looking TV in the range.
2. The remote is minimal and responsive.
3. Android TV and the OS is very responsive.
4. Picture quality is good and 4K and UHD videos can be enjoyed to the best.
5. Delivery and installation were done in time.
6. I bought for around 26k after exchanging my old 55 inch tv. At this price i think the tv offers great value.
7. Took Flipkart Complete protection plan for 2800 for 3 years

Cons :
1.TV speakers are low .
2. Dark scenes or grey areas in the picture the picture quality drops.

Everything is working very smooth after one week also .
But some downloaded apps like Hotstar cannot be browse properly .
Picture quality awesome , sound awesome , wall bracket of same company same model available very cheap in market but for warranty was forced to buy at high price .

Iffaclon is a sub brand of world's top Telivision manufacturer TCL. It provides best quality of Telivision . In a good cost . TCL & iffalcon is a same Brand just a name change . Iffalcon 55k71 & TCL 55P715 both are same tv . It doesn't support 5ghz Wifi band
Awesome product with great viewing experience and total value for money 👍only do proper picture setting for best output and sound bar for Dolby atoms / experience.

I've had the iFFalcon now for more than 3 months. I am very happy with the purchase:

Picture Quality - I wanted a TV with the capability of upgrading the SD quality pictures and this TV has that capability.

The 4K picture quality is surreal.

I am still trying to figure out which picture settings to use when I am using my PS4, when I play Fifa20, don't have any picture setting issues for God of War or Sniper Elite 4

Android OS - The boot time is considerably better(2Gb RAM and 16Gb storage). I've had a 1.25Gb RAM on my previous TV so in comparison it is much quicker.

I haven't installed a lot of applications.
I use Netflix, prime and hotstar. No issues to report.

Finally, I did a lot of research before I decided to buy this TV the number 1 TV on my wishlist was the VU Premium TV which was always unavailable. This was the next best TV so I decided to go ahead with the purchase and I can say I am very happy with the purchase because I got a good deal for this TV during the big billion sale.

Product delivered and installed in less than 24 hours. Here is my review based on three days of usage.

1. Audio quality is awesome, thanks to Dolby Audio and 30W stereo box. 10/10

2. Picture Quality is good, best in this price range with 4K HDR, micro dimming, dynamic color enhancement, 9/10.

3. Memory: 2GB Ram(On iffalcon website, few days ago it was mentioned 1gb by mistake but rectified now), 16GB HD, Android 9. TV released on 6th Aug 2020, so you will have all the latest updates already preconfigured. 9/10

4. Connectivity: Bluetooth v5, WI-FI, HDMI, USB, Voice control, Chromecast etc. In most of the Android 9 TV'S you will find Wi-Fi connectivity issues, I personally see this in MI and Kodak TV that once you re-start the TV, it doesn't detect the Wi-Fi automatically. I didn't find the issue in this TV.
WI-FI 5ghz band is missing. 9/10.


Overall 9.25/10

This TV comes with an inbuilt Chromecast that makes it easy for casting from your mobile phones. I've connected the TV via Wifi and haven't faced any connection issues so far. It also has an ethernet port. The picture quality is very good for the price we pay, even though black pixels could be darker in more expensive models. Overall I'm satisfied with the TV. I would strongly suggest purchasing the extended warranty that Flipkart offers. If the panel of any LED TV is damaged, it's almost impossible to repair, or will cost 70-80% of the TV cost. The extra warranty assures peace of mind for 3 years.

I was looking for Vu or Hisense TV for a month and they never came into stock. Vu was available for Rs 31000 three months ago, but at that time I wasn't looking to buy a TV. When I decided to buy most of the TVs were not in stock. I was looking at Nokia, Motorola, Iffalcon and Thomson. Vu tv gets most of its components from Hisense. Vu only puts the parts together in India. Same goes with Thomson and Kodak (same company assembles both the TVs). Hence, I decided to go for Iffalcon TV from TCL, which is in industry for a long time. In my opinion, Samsung/Sony/LG are way too pricey for the same features. On top of that TV technology changes so fast and not worth spending so much money just for a few advantages. The rate of depletion is also high on electronics.

All the sellers increased the price a week before the sale and gave some discount. Worst big billion days sale, for sure.

I bought the TV for 34750 (with SBI discount).

About TV......

The bezels of the TV are tiny and almost invisible. TV is light weight and comes with the wall mount.

The picture quality is great, but I feel brightness is a bit lower (300 nits). It looks bright on 100% brightness, but this deteriorates the longevity. Always good to set it to 50-60.

The sound quality is great with 30W speakers. Good for any hall size honestly. There is a good bass as well.

Connectivity is good with a single band wifi. There was no lag playing 4K videos with internet speed of 100 Mbps. But, when you first turn on the TV, the apps don't load fast. There is a slight delay and you will only see it when you first turn on the TV.

TV looks bad with SD quality channels as expected. Either have an HD box or watch prime videos to enjoy the clarity.

Installation guy from Jeeves wasn't so great. He just installed it and didn't demonstrate all the features of the TV.

I will update the review again in the future after exploring in more detail.

This is my first TCL brand product purchase (ifflacon is subsidiary of TCL) and I got the 43 inch model for 24250/- in sale.
Pros-
1. Look of the TV is good especially the bazelless frame.
2. Picture quality is decent. There was no issues in playing 4k videos. Also nice experience with movies, sports and gaming.
3. Sound quality is ok. Speakers are quite loud but lacks punch.
4. Setup is quite easy and it takes almost 15-20 sec to boot it up every time when the main power is switched off.
5. Google assistance for both remote and TV is ok, not great I would say.
6. Connectivity is decent. No issues while connecting to wifi and bluetooth headphones.
7. Was delivered on time and installation was done within next 2 days.

cons-
1.Specifications on iffalcon site and on flipkart are different. On its official site other than micro dimming no other feature is mentioned. So its not clear about TV characteristics and also its customer care guys (I got connected after a lot of tries) has no idea.
2.TV remote is bad, too small with hard keys and has no mute button.
3.Surprisingly there are no picture and sound options (almost every other brand provides this).
4.Screen sharing is bad when playing videos.
5.Single band wifi.(It did not bother me though)

Overall I would say a decent product in this price range.
